messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

Such a nice talk.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6726053/diff/1013/2012/go-docs.slide
File 2012/go-docs.slide (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6726053/diff/1013/2012/go-docs.slide#newcode108
2012/go-docs.slide:108: * Input for the previous slide redux
After watching you deliver this last night, I think it'd be better if you moved this and the next slide to after you introduce the .code function.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=21167c838549&repo=talks ***

go.talks/2012: add go-docs talk

R=adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6726053

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 6726053: go.talks/2012: add go-docs talk
